Establishment of the Diplomatic Academy is a very significant event in the history of our country.
I am sure that young people studying and studying here will honor the national interests of Azerbaijan in the future.
Azerbaijan's foreign policy is very flexible, dynamic, rapidly developing and is a foreign policy that brings great success to our country.
The main task facing the foreign policy is, of course, a matter of resolving the Armenian-Azerbaijani Nagorno-Karabakh conflict.
The embassies' activity in this direction is purposeful. The number of our friends and friends in the world is increasing.
Today the difference between Armenia and Azerbaijan is quite big. Our economy has gone unexpectedly.
Our military spending is twice as high as Armenia's budget. Our economic opportunities are expanding.
Countries' capacities, prestige, and power influence are often dependent on the population and its size. This dynamics is positive in our country.
At the meeting of the Cabinet of Ministers, I expressed my opinion on this issue. We have to make sure that the population of Azerbaijan will grow faster

We have diversified our economy by utilizing our energy resources efficiently and today the non-oil economy is developing.
Armenia is economically desperate.
Without the aid of foreign aid, loans, diaspora donations, Armenia's economy will collapse completely.
If those who understand the reality of the Armenian leadership still remain, they should understand that (cont) http://t.co/wz22qaMg
At present, if they agree on a variant on the negotiating table and are occupied (cont) http://t.co/InsuB3ic
Because they have great dangers in the future. The world is changing, you know the processes going on in the region.
It is not ruled out that time will come and each country will have to defend its interests alone. Azerbaijan is ready for it.

We are ready not only to struggle alone, we are fighting this, we confirm ourselves in the world, we define our future.
We can never allow Armenia to join any political, economic, energy, transport project.
We isolated them and do not hide it. In the future, our isolation policy should be continued.
If you have any questions, please contact us directly (cont) http://t.co/O27M6YuS
Otherwise, it is no exception to settle the matter in a different way. We have never ruled this out.
Each citizen of Azerbaijan, especially those engaged in diplomatic activity, should work hard every day to bring the victory to victory.
Another important foreign policy task is to promote the Khojaly genocide in the world
We have pursued a very successful policy in this direction and in a short time the parliament of the three countries adopted the Khojaly massacre as a genocide.
Our ambassadors and representatives of embassies should raise this issue wherever possible.
The issue of the Khojaly genocide should be raised in the legislative bodies of the countries where they work.
I am sure that in the future, other countries will join Mexico, Pakistan and Colombia, and the Khojaly genocide will be recognized by other countries.
The number of countries wishing to establish closer relations with Azerbaijan is growing, our foreign diplomacy is very active.
My numerous foreign trips reinforce this wonderful base and bring my country (cont) http://t.co/ANmgMoGW
Periodic demonstrations around the world, protest pickets, events, conferences show that we (cont) http://t.co/EzUK5EaE
Our ambassadors should be in close contact with the representatives of state bodies, should be in contact with the ministries of their countries
At the same time, relations with non-governmental organizations should be more active. Relations with the media should be more active.
For us, the Armenian lobby is the biggest enemy. I want to say again, I do not hesitate to say that.
Nobody can influence the will and policy of the Azerbaijani state.
Our history of independence has repeatedly demonstrated this. All these efforts are futile.
Azerbaijan strengthened. Azerbaijan has turned into a country that can not pressure us, blackmail us.
The reality is that Azerbaijan is an independent, modern, secular and dynamically developing social state.
We are creating infrastructure. On our initiative, the railway connecting Asia with Europe is being established.
When we tried to carry out the Baku-Tbilisi-Kars railway, we faced great pressures.
[Adm-01] The country’s improvement in the 2012 global competitiveness ranking could facilitate the expansion of... http://t.co/5AfnIS1I
We have initiated the TANAP project in a short time. We did all the preparatory work.
We pursue our energy diplomacy. We are pursuing our cultural diplomacy. Look, how many cultural events are taking place abroad.
This area must be in the spotlight. Because this area unites people more and creates a fuller picture of the country.
Our ancient culture, history, art is our national treasure. We must propagate this wealth and present it to the world.
The work of the embassies here is very important. Now the establishment of cultural services in embassies has begun.
Today, there is a situation in Azerbaijan regarding economic, political, and foreign policy (cont) http://t.co/foU0vfjc
Because of this, the beauty of Baku and other cities irritates some. Because we are moving forward very fast.
We must advance events in foreign policy, economic sphere and technology.
It is surprising to see some of the cosmic industry in a country like Azerbaijan? Why not?!
We have talented cadres, financial resources and vision for the future.
That's why we will not slow down in one step. We will go forward and achieve what we want.
I am sure that we will restore our sovereignty and one day the flag of Azerbaijan will be shaken in Shusha and Khankendi. Thank you!
